full_text:
I hope by presenting this meaningful information it will bring us closer to a resolution. If you have any questions before our next meeting on Thursday February 23, at 11:00 AM, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Very truly yours,

Guy P. Fronstin, Esq.
GPF/mw
Enclosures (as noted)

07/26/17 Page 46 of 131 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00030513

additional_notes: The document appears to be a letter from Guy P. Fronstin, Esq. to an unknown recipient. The letter is dated prior to February 23, as it references a meeting on that date. The document is part of a larger collection, as indicated by the 'Page 46 of 131' notation.
